name: fetchAnyEvent(forTask:occurrence:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches a single occurrence of a specific task asynchronously from the store. Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func fetchAnyEvent(forTask: OCKAnyTask, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyEvent>)

declaration: func fetchAnyEvent(forTask task: OCKAnyTask, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: @escaping OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyEvent>)
